EXISTS ( SELECT n.current_node FROM t_node_relation n WHERE
n.identity_flag = '${params.identityFlag}' and

mapper.select:
select ,C.merchant_name,D.para_name as pay_name from t_merchant_payway A left join t_merchant_info C on A.merchant_no = C.merchant_no left join t_mapping_dicion D on A.pay_code = D.para_val
order by ${orderBy}

select ,B.short_name as operator_name,C.merchant_name,D.para_name as pay_name from t_merchant_payway A left join t_sys_admin B on A.operator = B.id left join t_merchant_info C on A.merchant_no = C.merchant_no left join t_mapping_dicion D on A.pay_code = D.para_val where A.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_merchant_payway ( ID, channel_no, agent_no, MERCHANT_NO, PAY_CODE, T0_RATE, T1_RATE, RATE, RATE_AMOUNT, RECORD_STATUS, STATUS, ACCEPT_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, OPERATOR, REMARK, TEMP_1, TEMP_2 ) values ( #{id}, #{channelNo}, #{agentNo}, #{merchantNo}, #{payCode}, #{t0Rate}, #{t1Rate}, #{rate}, #{rateAmount}, #{recordStatus}, #{status}, #{acceptStatus}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{operator}, #{remark}, #{temp1}, #{temp2} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_merchant_payway A left join t_merchant_info C on A.merchant_no = C.merchant_no left join t_mapping_dicion D on A.pay_code = D.para_val

A.MERCHANT_NO = #{merchantNo},
A.PAY_CODE = #{payCode},
A.T0_RATE = #{t0Rate},
A.T1_RATE = #{t1Rate},
A.RATE = #{rate},

A.RECORD_STATUS = #{recordStatus},
A.STATUS = #{status},
A.ACCEPT_STATUS = #{acceptStatus},
A.CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
A.UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime},
A.OPERATOR = #{operator},

where A.ID = #{id}
update t_merchant_payway A set RATE_AMOUNT = #{rateAmount} WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_merchant_info B WHERE A.merchant_no = B.merchant_no AND B.channel_no = #{channelNo} )
mapper.select: select MIN(mp.t1_rate)m_t1_rate,MIN(mp.T0_RATE)m_t0_rate,MIN(mp.RATE)m_rate, (select min(tmp.t1_rate) from t_merchant_payway_tmp tmp where tmp.MERCHANT_NO in(select m.merchant_no from t_merchant_info m where m.agent_no = #{agentNo}) and tmp.PAY_CODE = #{payCode} and tmp.UPDATE_TIME >= str_to_date(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d'))tmp_t1_rate, (select min(tmp.t0_rate) from t_merchant_payway_tmp tmp where tmp.MERCHANT_NO in(select m.merchant_no from t_merchant_info m where m.agent_no = #{agentNo}) and tmp.PAY_CODE = #{payCode} and tmp.UPDATE_TIME >= str_to_date(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d'))tmp_t0_rate, (select min(tmp.rate) from t_merchant_payway_tmp tmp where tmp.MERCHANT_NO in(select m.merchant_no from t_merchant_info m where m.agent_no = #{agentNo}) and tmp.PAY_CODE = #{payCode} and tmp.UPDATE_TIME >= str_to_date(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d'))tmp_rate from t_merchant_payway mp where mp.MERCHANT_NO in(select m.merchant_no from t_merchant_info m where m.agent_no = #{agentNo} and m.record_status = 'Y') and mp.PAY_CODE = #{payCode} and mp.record_status = 'Y'
